title: Lone ranger
brief_description: An example of student film making; a zany view of one man’s day in London with homage to as many movie moguls as one can recognise from Frankenstein to Jean-Luc-Godard, with the Marx Brothers and Richard Lester thrown in - highly accomplished and very amusing. Music by Pete Townsend.
